StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [AssociateNwaToProspect]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NwaId uniqueiden..er, @ProspectId uniqueiden..er AS BEGIN DECLARE @result int
IF EXISTS(SELECT [ProspectId] FROM [USMC].[Prospect] WHERE [ProspectId] = @ProspectId) BEGIN IF EXISTS(SELECT [NwaId] FROM [USMC].[Prospect] WHERE [ProspectId] = @ProspectId AND [NwaId] IS NULL) BEGIN UPDATE [USMC].[Prospect] SET [NwaId] = @NwaId WHERE [ProspectId] = @ProspectId
IF @@ROWCOUNT = 1 BEGIN --Associa.on Successuful. SET @result = 1 END END ELSE --Prospect found but there was already an NWA associated. SET @result = 0 END ELSE --Prospect not found. SET @result = -1
SELECT @result END
